'''Pankration Fonta Cup''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Both Brains and Brawn}}.

It can be repeatedly filled with [[Fonta]] at the Fonta vending machine next to [[Heinry]] at the [[New Fontaine Research Institute]], which will change it to a [[Full Pankration Fonta Cup]]. The Full Pankration Fonta Cup can be used from the Inventory to yield the same effect as Fonta, and will become an empty Pankration Fonta Cup again once used.

The first, second and third tiers of the achievement ''[[The Final Fonta Sea]]'' can be obtained by refilling and using it once, 13 and 16 times in total, respectively.
